about.title: Precision-built frontend engineering
about.subtitle: React & Next.js engineering for SEO-driven fintech and e-commerce platforms.
body: I am a Senior Frontend Developer with 9+ years delivering production-grade web applications across e-commerce, marketplaces, and fintech. Each release balances SSR-driven SEO, Core Web Vitals, and frictionless checkout or trading flows.

My toolkit spans React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and performance profiling. I integrate Stripe/MAIB/MIA payments, Socket.io real-time flows, and localization at scale while reducing regressions through reusable UI systems.
Whether leading large redesigns, shipping trading games, or building SEO landing libraries, I treat frontend as a measurable system: faster rendering, smaller bundles, predictable deployments.

highlights.title: Career highlights
items: Page load times improved by ~15–25% via rendering and data-fetch optimizations.
UI responsiveness increased ~20–30% on complex flows by removing redundant renders.
SEO stability and indexability delivered through SSR metadata pipelines.
Payment integrations (Stripe / MAIB / MIA) with ~15–25% reduction in checkout issues.
UI regressions lowered ~30–40% by codifying reusable responsive patterns.
